sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: With five Golden Globes, Christopher Nolan's film Oppenheimer emerged victorious from its first confrontation with the blockbuster Barbie. It took home awards for Best Drama Film, Best Director, Best Supporting Actor and Best Soundtrack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And Cillian Murphy won Best Drama Actor for his portrayal of physicist Robert Oppenheimer.
